context.before: You have to avoid these user interview traps entrepreneurship November 22, 2020
context.after: "Stay close to your users" has become the principle of building great products. As a founder or product leader, are you obsessed with user interviews? You likely have already read about the best practices to do them. But having done 200+ user interviews in the last 18 months, I discovered that following the best practices wasnâ€™t enough, there were these frustrating traps that I learned to avoid.
